name: Bad Bunny!
description:
A simple game about keeping ravenous bunnies away from your precious garden. 

Ever since I found David Hellman's free Braid graphic collection, I've wanted to use the bunny. While preparing to teach a Construct 3 class, I finally got my chance . The participants chose to make a Tower Defense game - and that was all the incentive i needed.

Another purpose for making this game is to show how accessible and easy game-making can be. I wanted to see how much I could do in a few short weeks - with onlly the 25 events that the free/no-sign-up version of Construct 3 allows.  I love to encourage people and show them that they can create fun things without a lot of experience or a lot of money. 

Most of the art is in the public domain but I like to credit the sources, so here they are:

David Hellman's Braid art (it was a giveaway)

Game Art Guppy

Public Domain Vectors

I also made a few small things in PowerPoint - which can be a great, simple art maker if you're creative and persistent.

Hope you enjoy!
